channel.title: Buildable Power Shard
channel.description:
CHEAT. A Tier 7 very expensive recipe for you to produce your own Power Shards.
**Manufacturer (Ready in 10 minutes)** - 28 Turbo Motor - 56 Battery - 6 Nuclear Fuel Rod - 10 Adaptive Control Unit

item.title: Buildable Power Shard
item.dc:creator: @PJRM Pjrm
item.description:
@PJRM wrote:

Thank you for this awsome mod. Not a cheat at all.
May i ask for a true cheated version? “Tier 4 buildable power shard”? xD
